opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Verity International, Ltd. v. Federal Trade Commission

opinion:
127 S.Ct. 1868 (2007)

VERITY INTERNATIONAL, LTD., et al., petitioners,
v.
FEDERAL TRADE COMMISSION.

No. 06-669.

March 19, 2007.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit denied.
